description:
Tetsuro finally arrives at the final destination, Promethium. However, he still cannot choose whether or not to become a cyborg. He is given twenty-four hours to make up his mind. But, during that time, Tetsuro speaks to a cyborg who was sick of eternal life and attempts to commit suicide. This man tells Tetsuro of Maetel`s true identity as Promethium`s daughter. Then, his guide, Mirai, tells Tetsuro that he has been chosen to be a vanguard soldier of the Mechanized Empire. Tetsuro confronts Maetel...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Vision of Youth, Farewell, 999: Part One
青春の幻影 さらば999 前編
